name: Saigon By Night - Special Discovery in Saigon at Night
description: The nightlife in Saigon is non stop with endless stream of activities. With Bill Balo, you can see and experience the best part of Saigon by night, the most special city tour, ever. Have fun, get surprise LIKE A LOCAL. You can wander around the center of the city, enjoy both the hustle and the emptiness, the upbeat and the silence, the devil and the angel of the city by night within a few hours. With a little secret from Bill to make friend with anyone.
